metadata.title: CVE-2021-30152 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.31.13 and 1.32.x through1.35.x before 1.35.2. When using the MediaWiki API to "protect" a page, auser is currently able to protect to a higher level than they currentlyhave permissions for.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
